metadata.summary: Pangea multi-service security API providing reputation lookups for domains, files, IPs, URLs, and user breach data
metadata.primary_use_case: Perform comprehensive reputation checks across multiple data types with unified API

extracted_apis.description: Check domain reputation for malicious behavior
Check file hash reputation for malicious behavior
Check IP address reputation for malicious behavior
Check URL reputation for malicious behavior
Check if user PII or credentials have been exposed in breaches

cross_refs.description: Core concepts of API-based lookups and metadata_rules
Alternative domain and URL reputation service
Complementary IP reputation service with different focus
